name: Clumsy Clankers!
description:
You are in charge of training Security bots. They are required to move objects to specific locations and avoid dangerous hazards but be warned, the engineers didn't install an efficient power source for these bots, so their power will run out fast. 

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Click the point on the floor you want the bot to go towards.
  • Once the door you open, you can click on it to send the bot in.
  • GOOD LUCK!
